Item.body_html:
Workflow complete for ${Item[@type="ItemType"]/label} in Aras Innovator (details below).
Please log in to Innovator to see further information.

Finish State: ${Item[@type="Activity"]/name}
Direct Link: ${Item[2]/item_number}

Item: ${Item[@type="ItemType"]/label}
Item Number: ${Item[2]/item_number}
Issue: ${Item[2]/description}
Item.name: Meeting Workflow Close Notification
Item.query_string: <Item type="Activity" id="${Item/ActivityId}" action="get" select="name,message"/> <Item type="${Item/@type}" id="${Item/@id}" action="get" select="item_number,description"/> <Item type="ItemType" id="${Item/@typeId}" action="get" select="label"/>
Item.subject: Notification for ${Item[@type="ItemType"]/label}: ${Item[2]/item_number}
